basic_info.name: How To Reach Arya College of Engineering and IT?
description: Arya College of Engineering and IT is at a distance of 15 km from Jaipur at SP-42, RIICO Industrial Area, Kukas, Jaipur, Rajasthan. Students can easily reach the institute since it is the nearest college from Ajmer Gate (Jaipur Milestone – 0). An AC Low Floor Bus is available from Sanganer to Kukas that will help the students reach the institute. A local city bus number 29 is also always available for the students. Moreover, students can also easily get an auto or a taxi to drop them to the institute. For extra convenience, the institute also has its own transportation facility which can be availed at a cost of INR 30,000 p.a. for all the routes and INR 22,000 p.a. for special routes. basic_info.name: Arya College of Engineering and IT FAQs

Section.name: About ACEIT
Section.description:
Arya College of Engineering and IT (ACEIT) is one of the leading institutes of national significance located in Jaipur, Rajasthan. ACEIT is accredited by NAAC and approved by the AICTE and accredited by NAAC. Established in 2000, the college has also been accredited with an ‘A’ grade by affiliating university since the inception of QIV. Arya College of Engineering and IT is affiliated to the Rajasthan Technological University (RTU), Kota. ACEIT offers UG and PG courses in the field of Engineering and Management. The flagship courses of ACEIT a B.Tech program across several specializations and an M.Tech degree course. Candidates with Diploma in Engineering can also opt for lateral entry to the B,Tech course. ACEIT also runs an MBA degree program across 3 specializations. The institute shortlists candidates on the basis of JEE mains scores for the B.tech program. However, admission to the M.Tech course depends on candidate’s performance in GATE. Admission to the courses at ACEIT is done through the entrance examination. The institute accepts CAT scores for MBA admission. Check ACEIT Admissions
The college aims to become a leading Institute delivering Technocrats, Managers, and Entrepreneurs capable of transforming India into a “Technological and economical Superpower” besides establishing itself as an Educational Hub of worldwide acclaim. The college has MoUs with Oracle, RedHat, CISCO and EMC2. As per the latest placement report 2024, a whooping package of INR 32 LPA package was offered by Flipkart. Till date, the highest package reported is of INR 1 crore, followed by INR 85 LPA, and INR 56 LPA. Major recruiters of Arya College of Engineering and IT included Adobe, Dell, HCL, Capgemini, Tech Mahindra, IBM, Google, TCS & many more.
Arya College of Engineering and IT also has tie-ups with reputed organizations like Cisco, BSNL, Red Hat Academy, Texas Instruments, IETE, Institute of Engineers (India), Indian Society for Technical Education, etc.

Arya College of Engineering and IT is at a distance of 15 km from Jaipur at SP-42, RIICO Industrial Area, Kukas, Jaipur, Rajasthan. Students can easily reach the institute since it is the nearest college from Ajmer Gate (Jaipur Milestone – 0). An AC Low Floor Bus is available from Sanganer to Kukas that will help the students reach the institute. A local city bus number 29 is also always available for the students. Moreover, students can also easily get an auto or a taxi to drop them to the institute. For extra convenience, the institute also has its own transportation facility which can be availed at a cost of INR 30,000 p.a. for all the routes and INR 22,000 p.a. for special routes. Ques. What facilities are available at ACEIT hostels?
Ans.ACEIT has separate Hostels for male and female students. Facilities include centrally air-cooled, 2 & 3 occupancy rooms with attached toilets, tight security, internet access, STD facilities, fully equipped common rooms, biometric readers, latest IP cameras, fire warning systems, and 24-hour guards. Check: ACEIT Jaipur Hostel

Ans.For the B.Tech course, the tuition fee at ACEIT is INR 105,714 per annum.
Ques. How much is the tuition fee for the MBA program at ACEIT?
Ans.The tuition fee at ACEIR for the MBA course is INR 83,151 per annum.
Ques. What is the address of the ACEIT campus?
Ans.The ACEIT campus is situated at:

faqs.answer: Ans.ACEIT has separate Hostels for male and female students. Facilities include centrally air-cooled, 2 & 3 occupancy rooms with attached toilets, tight security, internet access, STD facilities, fully equipped common rooms, biometric readers, latest IP cameras, fire warning systems, and 24-hour guards.Check:ACEIT Jaipur Hostel

faqs.question: Does ACEIT have any Centre of Excellence?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, ACEIT has a number of Centres of Excellence. These are:Centre of Excellence in Robotics Research Development & AI in association with Seldom India Technology.Centre of Excellence in VLSI & Embedded System Design in association with Aviotron Automation LLP.Centre of Excellence in Cloud Computing in association with Grass Solutions Pvt. Ltd.Centre of Excellence in Advanced Automobile Engineering in association with Mahindra Rise.Centre of Excellence in HACKATHONCentre of Excellence in Solar Research & Development in association with Pink City Energy Pvt. Ltd.Centre of Excellence in Industrial Automation in association with Seldom India Technology.Centre of Excellence in Optical fibre Communication in association with RTTC-BSNLCentre of Excellence in Analog System Design in association with Texas University India Program.IIRS Outreach Program Model Center & Network InstituteSpace Society of Mechanical EngineersTesting in Embedded VLSI & VHDL Circuits.
